solution_line_template: If the company was producing {original_daily_production} toilet paper per day, when it ramped up its toilet paper production three times per day, it produced {ramp_up_factor}*{original_daily_production} = {increased_daily_production} more per day.

The total toilet production by the company increased to {original_daily_production}+{increased_daily_production} = <<{original_daily_production}+{increased_daily_production}={total_daily_production}>>{total_daily_production}

In March, with {days_in_march} days, the company produced a total of {total_daily_production}*{days_in_march} = <<{total_daily_production}*{days_in_march}={total_march_production}>>{total_march_production} toilet papers
